body_html: @MattKleinsmith, thanks for reporting the bug. We don't expect people to test everything in master before reporting bugs. We tend to mark issues as closed as soon as they're fixed in the master branch, even if we haven't released new binary builds with the fix.
body_text: @MattKleinsmith, thanks for reporting the bug. We don't expect people to test everything in master before reporting bugs. We tend to mark issues as closed as soon as they're fixed in the master branch, even if we haven't released new binary builds with the fix.
